Love the mod. I pretty much went and found every planet pack I could and am now in the process of putting them into my galaxy.

A couple of things:

To be compatible with OPM when using Trans-Keptunian planet as well, Kerbol's SOI needs to be around 1500000000000m

About moving bodies, I suggested moving Minmus in OPM and they said they wouldn't because a) they didn't want the mod to break saves and ![B)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_cool.png) they are aiming for an extension to stock, and I tend to agree

About the skybox: It's not Intergalactic space. It's Interstellar space, so that means space within a galaxy - ergo you would see stars and not total blackness
**DirtyFace83**: Intergalactic space would not be black either: it is full of galaxies.

> 
> **DirtyFace83**: Intergalactic space would not be black either: it is full of galaxies.

 Agreed.

Isn't Pantagruel a pulsar?

And in the movie, it is said that Edmund's Planet is orbiting Gargantua. Correct me if i'm wrong, though.

I love this mod! Out of all the great planet packs this one is my favorite, however I have encountered a couple of bugs.

First of all the planet Eden appears to be outside of the SOI of it's host star Eravante (should be an easy fix).

Pictures have been moved to [here](http://imgur.com/a/IxZdi).

Second, when I saw this picture of KSP orbiting the planet Kerbin I was beside myself! I think this may be an issue with the environments mod or Kopernicus (not sure if anyone else is having this issue).

JR

**Edit:** The problems listed above have been fixed in the latest release so I have removed the pictures and replaced them.

> 
> Isn't Pantagruel a pulsar?
> And in the movie, it is said that Edmund's Planet is orbiting Gargantua. Correct me if i'm wrong, though.

After the crew came back on the Endurance from Miller's planet, they decided going to Mann, even though Amelia (Brand) said that Edmunds was a better prospect since it didn't orbit Gargantua, and as such, more things would happen (asteroids, comets with base components of life) that otherwise would get sucked by Gargantua. In the older, 2008 script of the movie, this star is named Pantagruel, so it would be (near-) canonical to name it that way.

I'm also concerned about the total game time limit... I actually am not a big fan of "warp" mods... Say you sent a probe at a reasonably high velocity out at stockfish speeds... What's OPM?

> What's OPM?

Outer Planets Mod. It's one of the best planet packs out there, due to its cleverness and general stockalikeness while still being interesting.
This is such a great mod, well done!
is this compatible with planet shine and distant object enhancement?

> 
> is this compatible with planet shine and distant object enhancement?

As far as I know it doesn't have configs for them. In the playing I've done they seem to be technically compatible, but the new planets won't show up with Distant Object and I have no idea how Planetshine will react to you going into the SOI of a planet without a config.
